summary: Project named PlayPal; needs a logo in the previous format: the word "PlayPal" with a blue-to-yellow gradient and a line underneath.
known_issues: Deployment failed / unable to complete deployment (deployment error).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- “PlayPal” wordmark with a smooth blue-to-yellow gradient fill and a single thin horizontal underline below the text, centered on a transparent background (playpal-logo.dim_512x512.png, 512x512)
- “PlayPal” wordmark with a smooth blue-to-yellow gradient fill and a single thin horizontal underline below the text, centered on a transparent background (playpal-logo.dim_192x192.png, 192x192)
- “PlayPal” wordmark with a smooth blue-to-yellow gradient fill and a single thin horizontal underline below the text, centered on a transparent background (playpal-logo.dim_180x180.png, 180x180)

new_feature_requests.summary: Restore/create PlayPal logo in previous format (blue-to-yellow gradient text with an underline).

Replace the current PlayPal logo assets with the previous-format PlayPal wordmark: the text “PlayPal” filled with a blue-to-yellow gradient and a single horizontal line underneath, keeping the app name as “PlayPal”. The updated logo must be used everywhere the app currently references the PlayPal logo assets under /assets/generated/ (PWA icons, Apple touch icon, and the Login screen logo image).
